price: Tọ̄ sīn. (Allāhu ló mọ ohun tí Ó gbàlérò pẹ̀lú àwọn háràfí náà.)¹ Ìwọ̀nyí ni àwọn āyah al-Ƙur’ān àti (àwọn āyah) Tírà tó ń yanjú ọ̀rọ̀ ẹ̀dá.
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ
footnotes: 1. Ẹ wo ìtọsẹ̀-ọ̀rọ̀ sūrah al Baƙọrah; 2:1.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
